content: अशन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अश्-ल्युट्] Reaching, reaching across. --नः <ab>N.</ab> of a tree = असन <ab>q. v.</ab> --नं {@--1@} Pervasion, penetration. {@--2@} The act of eating, feeding. {@--3@} Tasting, enjoying. {@--4@} Food; अशनं धात्रा मरुत्कल्पितं व्यालानां <ls>Bh. 3. 10</ls>; मांसाशनं च नाश्नीयुः <ls>Ms. 5. 73</ls>; यज्ञशिष्ट° <ls n="Ms.">3. 118</ls>; फलमूलाशनैः <ls n="Ms.">5. 54</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> at the end of adjective <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘eating’, ‘one whose food is’ &c.; फलमूलाशन, हुताशन, पवनाशन &c.
